channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description: Pretend you have a script that makes the mouse go crazy on the Runescape screen, can Jagex detect that? Thanks. I would also appreciate it if someone lists what Jagex can detect for macroing thanks again.

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

If you are not flagged Jagex doesn’t detect your MouseMovements to my knowledge. However, accounts are easily flagged by suspicous acts, such as faling randomds, staying logged in for long periods of time, etc… Unfortuanattly (sp?) there is no way to detect if you are flagged or not, at the time.

Why not just use colors to find Audbury?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Yes I think something like straight lines that go about the screen to find certain things, e.g. the aubury.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

How do you mean by crazy?

Do you mean incredibly fast perfectly straight lines, or do you mean something like BoredHuman(); ?

Read full topic
